did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Mass Meeting of the Workingmen of the City of Philadelphia Broadside, 1873

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Workingmen of the City of Philadelphia

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This broadside announces, in German and English, the proceedings of a November 9, 1873 meeting held for working men in Philadelphia.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This broadside announces, in German and English, the proceedings of a November 9, 1873 meeting held for working men in Philadelphia.
